name: CheckUserInviteStatus
description:
Retrieve the status of a specific user invite.

This tool is used to get the current status of a user invite by its ID.

parameters.name: invite_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the user invite you want to check. This ID is necessary to retrieve the invite's status.

parameters.name: included_attributes
parameters.description: A list of attributes to include in the response. Specify attributes not normally returned in a standard response. Only the mini representation fields are returned unless explicitly specified.

value_schema.description:
A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the
response. This can be used to request fields that are
not normally returned in a standard response.

Be aware that specifying this parameter will have the
effect that none of the standard fields are returned in
the response unless explicitly specified, instead only
fields for the mini representation are returned, additional
to the fields requested.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the
response. This can be used to request fields that are
not normally returned in a standard response.

Be aware that specifying this parameter will have the
effect that none of the standard fields are returned in
the response unless explicitly specified, instead only
fields for the mini representation are returned, additional
to the fields requested.

value_schema.description:
A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the
response. This can be used to request fields that are
not normally returned in a standard response.

Be aware that specifying this parameter will have the
effect that none of the standard fields are returned in
the response unless explicitly specified, instead only
fields for the mini representation are returned, additional
to the fields requested.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
